short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best place to help you save time and up to $400 a year* when online shopping.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Microsoft Shopping extension helps you find coupons, discounts, and the best price on just about anything, from fashion to electronics and more.

Coupons - Microsoft Shopping has coupons from merchants across the web. As you add items to your cart, the extension actively scans the internet for available coupons and discount codes to apply when you check out.

Price history - Microsoft Shopping keeps track of an item's price, letting you know if now is a good time to buy. 

Price comparison - Microsoft Shopping searches the web to find the best prices online, and lets you know if what you are looking for is available at a better price elsewhere. 

User Insights - Microsoft Shopping provides AI-generated review summaries, pros and cons, giving you insights to make shopping decisions with ease.

Microsoft Shopping saves users an average of $400 a year. Shop with confidence with the Microsoft Shopping extension.

When you use Microsoft Shopping, merchants may pay us affiliate commissions.
